Articles.Content:
would it be possible to add other space programs who can do what you do with the same limitations on budget and science and who also want to complete contracts,

it would add some RPG elements to the game and add some thing like a space war with AI

i personally think it would add more to the game 

(maybe even have some sort of diplomacy in place for emergency docking of a AI space station/ rescue missions) 

thanks:)
